name: book.extended_drawers.patchouli.text22
pages: Just by placing some $(l:drawers)drawers@! next to each other you have created as simple network. However, that network doesn't do anything yet. $(br2)We'll start simple and add an $(l:access_points)access point@! to the network. It allows you to insert items into the drawers they belong in without walking over to them.
